value.body: Tales of Meeting and Parting (1985; short)
value.text: Tales of Meeting and Parting (1985; short)

paragraphs.body: Sakata's first appearance on the big screen was in the 1992 erotic thriller Poison Ivy. In 2005 she appeared in a minor role as a field reporter in xXx: State of the Union.
paragraphs.text: Sakata's first appearance on the big screen was in the 1992 erotic thriller Poison Ivy. In 2005 she appeared in a minor role as a field reporter in xXx: State of the Union.

paragraphs.body: Sakata has performed in many stage productions, working often with East West Players (EWP) in Los Angeles. In 2002 she won the Ovation Award for Lead Actress in a Play for her performance in Chay Yew's Red at EWP. In 2007, her first play, Dawn's Light: The Journey of Gordon Hirabayshi, premiered at EWP.
